parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.label: Resource Type
parameters.query:
AzureOptimizationReservationsUsageV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
| distinct ResourceType
| order by ResourceType asc

parameters.name: Reservation
parameters.query:
AzureOptimizationReservationsUsageV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded' and ResourceType in ({ResourceType:value})
| distinct ReservationId_g, DisplayName_s
| order by DisplayName_s asc

parameters.name: UseISF
parameters.label: Instance Size Flexibility?
parameters.description: Groups reservation by ISF (excludes non-VM reservations)

content.json: Consumption data is updated once every 24 hours and is presented in the currency of your Azure consumption agreement.
If below tiles are reporting query errors, you must set up Pricesheet exports. See more details [here](https://aka.ms/AzureOptimizationEngine/commitmentssetup).

content.query:
let LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption' and MeterSubCategory_s !endswith "Windows"
| extend MeterSubCategory_s = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Linux'))
| summarize LinuxUnitPrice=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by LinuxMeterId=MeterID_g, MeterName_s, MeterSubCategory_s, MeterRegion_s, LinuxUnitOfMeasure=UnitOfMeasure_s;
let VMOnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption'
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Windows'))
| extend WindowsMeterSubCategory = MeterSubCategory_s
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, 0, indexof(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, ' Linux'))
| summarize UnitPrice_s=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by MeterID_g, MeterName_s, NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, WindowsMeterSubCategory, MeterRegion_s, UnitOfMeasure_s
| join kind=leftouter ( LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet ) on MeterName_s, MeterRegion_s, $left.NonWindowsMeterSubcategory == $right.MeterSubCategory_s
| extend PricesheetPrice = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitPrice), LinuxUnitPrice, UnitPrice_s)
| extend PricesheetUnitOfMeasure = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitOfMeasure), LinuxUnitOfMeasure, UnitOfMeasure_s)
| extend UnitHrs = toint(substring(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 0, indexof(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 'Hour')-1))
| extend OnDemandUnitPrice = PricesheetPrice/UnitHrs
| distinct MeterID_g, OnDemandUnitPrice;
let OnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption'
| summarize OnDemandUnitPrice = max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by MeterID_g
| distinct MeterID_g, OnDemandUnitPrice
| union (VMOnDemandPriceSheet)
| summarize OnDemandUnitPrice=min(OnDemandUnitPrice) by MeterID_g;
let ReservationPricesheet = AzureOptimizationReservationsPriceV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| extend Term_s = iif(reservationTerm_s == '3 Years', 'P3Y', 'P1Y')
| extend TermDivider = iif(reservationTerm_s == '3 Years', 3, 1)
| extend ReservationPrice = todouble(replace_string(unitPrice_s,',','.'))/TermDivider/12/730
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, ReservationPrice) by Location_s=tolower(armRegionName_s), SkuName=tolower(armSkuName_s), Term_s;
let ReservationOnDemandMeters = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| extend SkuName = tolower(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| distinct ReservationId_g, MeterId_g, SkuName;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
| extend RINormalizationRatio = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).RINormalizationRatio)
| extend UsedRIs = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(RINormalizationRatio) / 24
| summarize UsedRIsDaily=round(sum(UsedRIs),2) by Date_s, ReservationId_g
| summarize AvgRIsUsedDaily=round(avg(UsedRIsDaily),2) by ReservationId_g
| join kind=rightouter (
    AzureOptimizationReservationsUsageV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
    | where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ReservationId_g
    | where ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
    | project ReservationId_g, ReservationName_s=DisplayName_s, SKUName_s, Location_s, Util7Days_s, Util30Days_s, TotalReservedQuantity_s, Term_s
) on ReservationId_g
| project ReservationId_g=ReservationId_g1, ReservationName_s, TotalReservedQuantity_s, SKUName_s=tolower(SKUName_s), Location_s, AvgRIsUsedDaily=iif(isempty(AvgRIsUsedDaily), 0.0, AvgRIsUsedDaily), Util7Days_s, Util30Days_s, Term_s
| join kind=leftouter (ReservationOnDemandMeters) on ReservationId_g
| summarize arg_max(MeterId_g, *) by ReservationId_g
| join kind=leftouter (ReservationPricesheet) on SkuName and Location_s and Term_s
| join kind=leftouter (OnDemandPriceSheet) on $left.MeterId_g == $right.MeterID_g
| extend DiscountPercent = (1 - ReservationPrice/OnDemandUnitPrice) * 100
| project ReservationId_g, ReservationName_s, TotalReservedQuantity_s=round(todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s)), SKUName_s, Location_s, AvgRIsUsedDaily, Util7Days_s=round(todouble(Util7Days_s)), Util30Days_s=round(todouble(Util30Days_s)), DiscountPercent, SavingsMargin=round(todouble(Util7Days_s))-100.0+DiscountPercent 
| order by Util7Days_s asc
content.title: Reservation Usage Details (click on a line for more details)

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| where ReservationId_g == '{selectedReservation:value}'
| extend RINormalizationRatio = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).RINormalizationRatio)
| extend VMSize = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| extend ConsumedSize = iif(isnotempty(VMSize), VMSize, strcat(MeterSubCategory_s, ' ', MeterName_s))
| extend UsedRIs = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(RINormalizationRatio) / 24
| summarize round(sum(UsedRIs),1) by todatetime(Date_s), ConsumedSize
content.title: Average RI Usage Count by Size (click on a line in the table at the left)

content.query:
let absoluteRIBought = toscalar(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')
    and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}')
    and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
    and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| where ReservationId_g == '{selectedReservation:value}'
| summarize (datetime_diff('Day',max(todatetime(Date_s)),min(todatetime(Date_s)))+1)*{selectedQuantity});
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| where ReservationId_g == '{selectedReservation:value}'
| extend RINormalizationRatio = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).RINormalizationRatio)
| extend UsedRIs = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(RINormalizationRatio) / 24
| summarize UsedRIPercentage=round(sum(UsedRIs) / absoluteRIBought * 100, 2) by ResourceId, SubscriptionId
| join kind=leftouter ( 
    AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL 
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ContainerType_s == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project Subscription=ContainerName_s, SubscriptionId=SubscriptionGuid_g
) on SubscriptionId
| project-away SubscriptionId*
| project-reorder ResourceId, Subscription, UsedRIPercentage
| order by ResourceId asc, UsedRIPercentage
content.title: Average Daily Reservation Usage by Resource (click on a line in the table above)

content.query:
let absoluteRIBought = toscalar(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')
    and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}')
    and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
    and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| where ReservationId_g == '{selectedReservation:value}'
| summarize (datetime_diff('Day',max(todatetime(Date_s)),min(todatetime(Date_s)))+1)*{selectedQuantity});
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| where ReservationId_g == '{selectedReservation:value}'
| extend RINormalizationRatio = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).RINormalizationRatio)
| extend Tags_s = iif(Tags_s startswith "{", Tags_s, strcat("{", Tags_s, "}"))
| extend AggregatorTag = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{Aggregator}'])
| extend UsedRIs = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(RINormalizationRatio) / 24
| summarize UsedRIPercentage=round(sum(UsedRIs) / absoluteRIBought * 100, 2) by AggregatorTag, SubscriptionId
| join kind=leftouter ( 
    AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL 
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ContainerType_s == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project Subscription=ContainerName_s, SubscriptionId=SubscriptionGuid_g
) on SubscriptionId
| project-away SubscriptionId*
| project-reorder AggregatorTag, Subscription, UsedRIPercentage
| order by AggregatorTag asc, UsedRIPercentage
content.title: Average Daily Reservation Usage by Tag (click on a line in the table above)

content.json: VM count for Instance Size Flexibility Groups is proportional to the VM size with the lowest ratio (1).

content.query:
let ISFGroups = externaldata(ISFGroup:string, ArmSKUName:string, Ratio:double) [@"https://aka.ms/isf"] with(ignoreFirstRecord=true) | extend ArmSKUName=tolower(ArmSKUName);
let LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption' and MeterSubCategory_s !endswith "Windows"
| extend MeterSubCategory_s = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Linux'))
| summarize LinuxUnitPrice=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by LinuxMeterId=MeterID_g, MeterName_s, MeterSubCategory_s, MeterRegion_s, LinuxUnitOfMeasure=UnitOfMeasure_s;
let VMOnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption'
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Windows'))
| extend WindowsMeterSubCategory = MeterSubCategory_s
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, 0, indexof(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, ' Linux'))
| summarize UnitPrice_s=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by MeterID_g, MeterName_s, NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, WindowsMeterSubCategory, MeterRegion_s, UnitOfMeasure_s
| join kind=leftouter ( LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet ) on MeterName_s, MeterRegion_s, $left.NonWindowsMeterSubcategory == $right.MeterSubCategory_s
| extend PricesheetPrice = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitPrice), LinuxUnitPrice, UnitPrice_s)
| extend PricesheetUnitOfMeasure = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitOfMeasure), LinuxUnitOfMeasure, UnitOfMeasure_s)
| extend UnitHrs = toint(substring(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 0, indexof(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 'Hour')-1))
| extend OnDemandUnitPrice = PricesheetPrice/UnitHrs
| distinct MeterID_g, OnDemandUnitPrice;
let OnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption'
| summarize OnDemandUnitPrice = max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by MeterID_g
| distinct MeterID_g, OnDemandUnitPrice
| union (VMOnDemandPriceSheet)
| summarize OnDemandUnitPrice=min(OnDemandUnitPrice) by MeterID_g;
let ReservationPricesheet = AzureOptimizationReservationsPriceV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| extend Term_s = iif(reservationTerm_s == '3 Years', 'P3Y', 'P1Y')
| extend TermDivider = iif(reservationTerm_s == '3 Years', 3, 1)
| extend ReservationPrice = todouble(replace_string(unitPrice_s,',','.'))/TermDivider/12/730
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, ReservationPrice) by Location_s=tolower(armRegionName_s), SkuName=tolower(armSkuName_s), Term_s;
let ReservationOnDemandMeters = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| extend SkuName = tolower(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| distinct ReservationId_g, MeterId_g, SkuName;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
| extend RINormalizationRatio = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).RINormalizationRatio)
| extend UsedRIs = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(RINormalizationRatio) / 24
| summarize UsedRIsDaily=round(sum(UsedRIs),2) by Date_s, ReservationId_g
| summarize AvgRIsUsedDaily=round(avg(UsedRIsDaily),2) by ReservationId_g
| join kind=rightouter (
    AzureOptimizationReservationsUsageV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
    | where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ReservationId_g
    | where ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
    | extend UsedQuantity = todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) * todouble(Util7Days_s) / 100
    | extend UsedQuantity30d = todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) * todouble(Util30Days_s) / 100
    | extend SKUName_s=tolower(SKUName_s)
    | project ReservationId_g, ReservationName_s=DisplayName_s, SKUName_s, Location_s, UsedQuantity, UsedQuantity30d, TotalReservedQuantity_s, Term_s, AppliedScopeType_s
) on ReservationId_g
| project ReservationId_g=ReservationId_g1, ReservationName_s, TotalReservedQuantity_s, SKUName_s, Location_s, AvgRIsUsedDaily=iif(isempty(AvgRIsUsedDaily), 0.0, AvgRIsUsedDaily), UsedQuantity, UsedQuantity30d, Term_s, AppliedScopeType_s
| join kind=inner ( ISFGroups ) on $left.SKUName_s == $right.ArmSKUName
| join kind=leftouter ( ReservationOnDemandMeters ) on ReservationId_g
| summarize arg_max(MeterId_g, *) by ReservationId_g
| join kind=leftouter ( ReservationPricesheet ) on SkuName and Location_s and Term_s
| join kind=leftouter ( OnDemandPriceSheet ) on $left.MeterId_g == $right.MeterID_g
| extend DiscountPercent = (1 - ReservationPrice/OnDemandUnitPrice) * 100
| extend AvgRIsUsedInSmallestRatio = Ratio * AvgRIsUsedDaily
| summarize TotalReservedQuantity_s=sum(todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s)*Ratio), AvgRIsUsedDaily=sum(AvgRIsUsedInSmallestRatio), UsedQuantity=sum(UsedQuantity*Ratio), UsedQuantity30d=sum(UsedQuantity30d*Ratio), AvgDiscountPercent=avg(DiscountPercent) by ISFGroup, Location_s, Term_s, AppliedScopeType_s
| extend Util7Days_s = UsedQuantity/TotalReservedQuantity_s*100, Util30Days_s = UsedQuantity30d/TotalReservedQuantity_s*100
| extend AvgRIUsagePercentInSmallestRatio = round(AvgRIsUsedDaily / TotalReservedQuantity_s * 100, 1)
| extend AvgDiscountPercent=iif(AvgDiscountPercent > 0.0, AvgDiscountPercent, 0.0)
| extend SavingsMargin=round(todouble(Util7Days_s))-100.0+AvgDiscountPercent 
| project-away AvgRIUsagePercentInSmallestRatio, AvgRIsUsedDaily
| project-reorder ISFGroup, Location_s, Term_s, AppliedScopeType_s, TotalReservedQuantity_s, Util7Days_s, UsedQuantity, Util30Days_s, UsedQuantity30d
| order by Util7Days_s asc
content.title: Reservation Usage Details grouped by ISF group (click on a line for more details)

content.query:
let ISFGroups = externaldata(ISFGroup:string, ArmSKUName:string, Ratio:double) [@"https://aka.ms/isf"] with(ignoreFirstRecord=true) | extend ArmSKUName=tolower(ArmSKUName);
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| where ResourceLocation_s == '{selectedRegion}'
| extend VMSize = tolower(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| join kind=inner ( ISFGroups ) on $left.VMSize == $right.ArmSKUName
| where ISFGroup == '{selectedISFGroup:value}'
| extend RINormalizationRatio = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).RINormalizationRatio)
| extend ConsumedSize = iif(isnotempty(VMSize), VMSize, strcat(MeterSubCategory_s, ' ', MeterName_s))
| extend UsedRIs = todouble(Quantity_s) / 24 * Ratio
| summarize round(sum(UsedRIs),1) by todatetime(Date_s), ConsumedSize
content.title: Average RI Usage Count by Size (click on a line in the table at the left)

content.query:
let ISFGroups = externaldata(ISFGroup:string, ArmSKUName:string, Ratio:double) [@"https://aka.ms/isf"] with(ignoreFirstRecord=true) | extend ArmSKUName=tolower(ArmSKUName);
let absoluteRIBought = toscalar(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')
    and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}')
    and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
    and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| extend VMSize = tolower(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| where ResourceLocation_s == '{selectedRegion}'
| join kind=inner ( ISFGroups ) on $left.VMSize == $right.ArmSKUName
| where ISFGroup == '{selectedISFGroup:value}'
| summarize (datetime_diff('Day',max(todatetime(Date_s)),min(todatetime(Date_s)))+1)*{selectedQuantity});
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| extend VMSize = tolower(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| where ResourceLocation_s == '{selectedRegion}'
| join kind=inner ( ISFGroups ) on $left.VMSize == $right.ArmSKUName
| where ISFGroup == '{selectedISFGroup:value}'
| extend UsedRIs = todouble(Quantity_s) * Ratio / 24
| summarize UsedRIPercentage=round(sum(UsedRIs) / absoluteRIBought * 100, 2) by ResourceId, SubscriptionId
| join kind=leftouter ( 
    AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL 
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ContainerType_s == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project Subscription=ContainerName_s, SubscriptionId=SubscriptionGuid_g
) on SubscriptionId
| project-away SubscriptionId*
| project-reorder ResourceId, Subscription, UsedRIPercentage
| order by ResourceId asc, UsedRIPercentage
content.title: Average Daily Reservation Usage by Resource (click on a line in the table above)

content.query:
let ISFGroups = externaldata(ISFGroup:string, ArmSKUName:string, Ratio:double) [@"https://aka.ms/isf"] with(ignoreFirstRecord=true) | extend ArmSKUName=tolower(ArmSKUName);
let absoluteRIBought = toscalar(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')
    and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}')
    and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
    and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| extend VMSize = tolower(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| where ResourceLocation_s == '{selectedRegion}'
| join kind=inner ( ISFGroups ) on $left.VMSize == $right.ArmSKUName
| where ISFGroup == '{selectedISFGroup:value}'
| summarize (datetime_diff('Day',max(todatetime(Date_s)),min(todatetime(Date_s)))+1)*{selectedQuantity});
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| extend VMSize = tolower(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| where ResourceLocation_s == '{selectedRegion}'
| join kind=inner ( ISFGroups ) on $left.VMSize == $right.ArmSKUName
| where ISFGroup == '{selectedISFGroup:value}'
| extend Tags_s = iif(Tags_s startswith "{", Tags_s, strcat("{", Tags_s, "}"))
| extend AggregatorTag = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{Aggregator}'])
| extend UsedRIs = todouble(Quantity_s) * Ratio / 24
| summarize UsedRIPercentage=round(sum(UsedRIs) / absoluteRIBought * 100, 2) by AggregatorTag, SubscriptionId
| join kind=leftouter ( 
    AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL 
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ContainerType_s == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project Subscription=ContainerName_s, SubscriptionId=SubscriptionGuid_g
) on SubscriptionId
| project-away SubscriptionId*
| project-reorder AggregatorTag, Subscription, UsedRIPercentage
| order by AggregatorTag asc, UsedRIPercentage
content.title: Average Daily Reservation Usage by Tag (click on a line in the table above)

content.query:
let DaysSeenByReservation = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
| summarize DaysSeen=datetime_diff('Day', max(todatetime(Date_s)), min(todatetime(Date_s)))+1 by ReservationId_g;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
| extend RINormalizationRatio = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).RINormalizationRatio)
| extend Tags_s = iif(Tags_s startswith "{", Tags_s, strcat("{", Tags_s, "}"))
| extend AggregatorTag = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{Aggregator}'])
| extend UsedRIs = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(RINormalizationRatio) / 24
| summarize TotalUsedRIs=round(sum(UsedRIs),2) by ReservationId_g, AggregatorTag, SubscriptionId
| join kind=inner (DaysSeenByReservation) on ReservationId_g
| project-away ReservationId_g1
| join kind=leftouter ( 
    AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL 
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ContainerType_s == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project Subscription=ContainerName_s, SubscriptionId=SubscriptionGuid_g
) on SubscriptionId
| project-away SubscriptionId*
| join kind=inner (
    AzureOptimizationReservationsUsageV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')
    | where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ReservationId_g
    | project ReservationId_g, TotalReservedQuantity_s, ReservationName_s=DisplayName_s
) on ReservationId_g
| project-away ReservationId_g1
| extend UsedRIPercentage = TotalUsedRIs / (todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) * DaysSeen) * 100
| project-reorder ReservationName_s, AggregatorTag
| order by ReservationId_g

AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'UnusedReservation'
| where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
| extend UnusedCost = todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)
| project todatetime(Date_s), ReservationName_s, UnusedCost
content.title: Cost of Unused Reservations over time

content.query:
let ISFGroups = externaldata(ISFGroup:string, ArmSKUName:string, Ratio:double) [@"https://aka.ms/isf"] with(ignoreFirstRecord=true) | extend ArmSKUName=tolower(ArmSKUName);
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'UnusedReservation'
| where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
| extend UnusedCost = todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)
| join kind=leftouter (
    AzureOptimizationReservationsUsageV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
    | where ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
    | extend UnusedQuantity = todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) - (todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) * todouble(Util7Days_s) / 100)
    | extend UnusedQuantity30d = todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) - (todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) * todouble(Util30Days_s) / 100)
    | project ReservationId_g, SKUName_s=tolower(SKUName_s), Location_s
) on ReservationId_g
| join kind=leftouter ( ISFGroups ) on $left.SKUName_s == $right.ArmSKUName
| extend SKUName = iif('{UseISF}' == 'Yes', strcat(ISFGroup, " ", Location_s), strcat(SKUName_s, " ", Location_s))
| extend SKUName = iif(strlen(SKUName) < 2, 'Canceled RIs', SKUName)
| summarize sum(UnusedCost) by todatetime(Date_s), SKUName
content.title: Cost of Unused Reservations over time (by SKU)

content.json: Canceled RIs are not considered in the historical view. VM count for Instance Size Flexibility Groups is proportional to the VM size with the lowest ratio (1).

content.query:
let ISFGroups = externaldata(ISFGroup:string, ArmSKUName:string, Ratio:double) [@"https://aka.ms/isf"] with(ignoreFirstRecord=true) | extend ArmSKUName=tolower(ArmSKUName);
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'UnusedReservation'
| where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
| extend UnusedHours = todouble(Quantity_s)
| join kind=inner (
    AzureOptimizationReservationsUsageV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
    | where ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
    | extend UnusedQuantity = todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) - (todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) * todouble(Util7Days_s) / 100)
    | extend UnusedQuantity30d = todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) - (todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) * todouble(Util30Days_s) / 100)
    | project ReservationId_g, SKUName_s=tolower(SKUName_s), Location_s
) on ReservationId_g
| join kind=leftouter ( ISFGroups ) on $left.SKUName_s == $right.ArmSKUName
| extend SKUName = iif('{UseISF}' == 'Yes', strcat(ISFGroup, " ", Location_s), strcat(SKUName_s, " ", Location_s))
| extend UnusedVMs = iif('{UseISF}' == 'Yes', UnusedHours * Ratio / 24, UnusedHours / 24)
| summarize sum(UnusedVMs) by todatetime(Date_s), SKUName
content.title: Unused Reservations over time (by VM count)

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'UnusedReservation'
| where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
| summarize TotalUnusedCost = sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)) by ReservationId_g
| where round(TotalUnusedCost) > 0
| join kind=inner (
    AzureOptimizationReservationsUsageV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
    | where ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
    | extend UnusedQuantity = todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) - (todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) * todouble(Util7Days_s) / 100)
    | extend UnusedQuantity30d = todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) - (todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) * todouble(Util30Days_s) / 100)
    | project ReservationId_g, ReservationName_s=DisplayName_s, ExpiryDate_s, SKUName_s, Location_s, TotalReservedQuantity_s, Term_s, AppliedScopeType_s, Util7Days_s, UnusedQuantity, Util30Days_s, UnusedQuantity30d
) on ReservationId_g
| project-away ReservationId_g1
| project-reorder ReservationName_s, TotalUnusedCost
| order by TotalUnusedCost
content.title: Unused Reservations Details

content.json: VM count for Instance Size Flexibility Groups is proportional to the VM size with the lowest ratio (1).

content.query:
let ISFGroups = externaldata(ISFGroup:string, ArmSKUName:string, Ratio:double) [@"https://aka.ms/isf"] with(ignoreFirstRecord=true) | extend ArmSKUName=tolower(ArmSKUName);
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'UnusedReservation'
| where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
| summarize TotalUnusedCost = sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)) by ReservationId_g
| where round(TotalUnusedCost) > 0
| join kind=inner (
    AzureOptimizationReservationsUsageV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
    | where ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
    | extend UnusedQuantity = todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) - (todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) * todouble(Util7Days_s) / 100)
    | extend UnusedQuantity30d = todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) - (todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s) * todouble(Util30Days_s) / 100)
    | project ReservationId_g, ReservationName_s=DisplayName_s, SKUName_s=tolower(SKUName_s), Location_s, TotalReservedQuantity_s, Term_s, AppliedScopeType_s, UnusedQuantity, UnusedQuantity30d
) on ReservationId_g
| project-away ReservationId_g1
| join kind=inner ( ISFGroups ) on $left.SKUName_s == $right.ArmSKUName
| summarize TotalUnusedCost=sum(TotalUnusedCost), TotalReservedQuantity_s=sum(todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s)*Ratio), UnusedQuantity=sum(UnusedQuantity*Ratio), UnusedQuantity30d=sum(UnusedQuantity30d*Ratio) by ISFGroup, Location_s, Term_s, AppliedScopeType_s
| extend Util7Days_s = (1-UnusedQuantity/TotalReservedQuantity_s)*100, Util30Days_s = (1-UnusedQuantity30d/TotalReservedQuantity_s)*100
| project-reorder ISFGroup, TotalUnusedCost, Location_s, Term_s, AppliedScopeType_s, TotalReservedQuantity_s, Util7Days_s, UnusedQuantity, Util30Days_s
| order by TotalUnusedCost
content.title: Unused Reservations Details (grouped by Instance Size Flexibility group)

content.query:
let LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption' and MeterSubCategory_s !endswith "Windows"
| extend MeterSubCategory_s = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Linux'))
| summarize LinuxUnitPrice=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by LinuxMeterId=MeterID_g, MeterName_s, MeterSubCategory_s, MeterRegion_s, LinuxUnitOfMeasure=UnitOfMeasure_s;
let VMOnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption'
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Windows'))
| extend WindowsMeterSubCategory = MeterSubCategory_s
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, 0, indexof(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, ' Linux'))
| summarize UnitPrice_s=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by MeterID_g, MeterName_s, NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, WindowsMeterSubCategory, MeterRegion_s, UnitOfMeasure_s
| join kind=leftouter ( LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet ) on MeterName_s, MeterRegion_s, $left.NonWindowsMeterSubcategory == $right.MeterSubCategory_s
| extend PricesheetPrice = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitPrice), LinuxUnitPrice, UnitPrice_s)
| extend PricesheetUnitOfMeasure = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitOfMeasure), LinuxUnitOfMeasure, UnitOfMeasure_s)
| extend UnitHrs = toint(substring(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 0, indexof(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 'Hour')-1))
| extend OnDemandUnitPrice = PricesheetPrice/UnitHrs
| distinct MeterID_g, OnDemandUnitPrice;
let OnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption'
| summarize OnDemandUnitPrice = max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by MeterID_g
| union (VMOnDemandPriceSheet)
| summarize OnDemandUnitPrice=min(OnDemandUnitPrice) by MeterID_g;
let ReservationPricesheet = materialize(AzureOptimizationReservationsPriceV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| extend Term_s = iif(reservationTerm_s == '3 Years', 'P3Y', 'P1Y')
| extend TermDivider = iif(reservationTerm_s == '3 Years', 3, 1)
| extend ReservationPrice = todouble(replace_string(unitPrice_s,',','.'))/TermDivider/12/730
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, ReservationPrice) by Location_s=tolower(armRegionName_s), SkuName=tolower(armSkuName_s), Term_s);
let ReservationOnDemandMeters = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| extend SkuName = tolower(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| distinct ReservationId_g, MeterId_g, SkuName;
let ISFGroups = externaldata(ISFGroup:string, ArmSKUName:string, Ratio:double) [@"https://aka.ms/isf"] with(ignoreFirstRecord=true) | extend skuName=tolower(ArmSKUName);
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ReservationName_s)
| where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
| extend RINormalizationRatio = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).RINormalizationRatio)
| extend UsedRIs = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(RINormalizationRatio) / 24
| summarize UsedRIsDaily=round(sum(UsedRIs),2) by Date_s, ReservationId_g
| summarize AvgRIsUsedDaily=round(avg(UsedRIsDaily),2) by ReservationId_g
| join kind=rightouter (
    AzureOptimizationReservationsUsageV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
    | where ReservationId_g in ({Reservation:value})
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ReservationId_g
    | where ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
    | project ReservationId_g, ReservationName_s=DisplayName_s, SKUName_s, Location_s, Util7Days_s, Util30Days_s, TotalReservedQuantity_s, Term_s, ExpiryDate_s
) on ReservationId_g
| project ReservationId_g=ReservationId_g1, ReservationName_s, TotalReservedQuantity_s, SKUName_s=tolower(SKUName_s), Location_s, AvgRIsUsedDaily=iif(isempty(AvgRIsUsedDaily), 0.0, AvgRIsUsedDaily), Util7Days_s, Util30Days_s, Term_s, ExpiryDate_s
| join kind=leftouter ( ISFGroups ) on $left.SKUName_s==$right.skuName
| join kind=leftouter (ReservationOnDemandMeters) on ReservationId_g
| summarize arg_max(MeterId_g, *) by ReservationId_g
| join kind=leftouter (ReservationPricesheet) on SkuName and Location_s and Term_s
| join kind=leftouter (OnDemandPriceSheet) on $left.MeterId_g == $right.MeterID_g
| extend DiscountPercent = (1 - ReservationPrice/OnDemandUnitPrice) * 100
| project-away ReservationPrice
| join kind=leftouter (ReservationPricesheet) on $left.SKUName_s==$right.SkuName and Location_s and Term_s
| extend HoursUntilExpiry=(todatetime(ExpiryDate_s)-now())/1h
| extend TotalReservedHoursToConsume=todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s)*HoursUntilExpiry
| extend AmountRemainingToConsume = round(TotalReservedHoursToConsume * ReservationPrice, 2)
| project ReservationId_g, ReservationName_s, TotalReservedQuantity_s=round(todouble(TotalReservedQuantity_s)), SKUName_s, ISFGroup, Location_s, Term_s, ExpiryDate_s, AmountRemainingToConsume, AvgRIsUsedDaily, Util7Days_s=round(todouble(Util7Days_s)), Util30Days_s=round(todouble(Util30Days_s)), DiscountPercent, SavingsMargin=round(todouble(Util7Days_s))-100.0+DiscountPercent 
| order by Util7Days_s asc

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Remaining commitment to be consumed until the reservation expiry date (value in the currency of your consumption agreement)
